welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Weare, the charming town known for its scenic beauty and small-town charm. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this wonderful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Manchester-Boston Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Manchester-Boston Regional Airport serves regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 2 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boire Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Boire Field Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods and packages.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dillant-Hopkins Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dillant-Hopkins Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
